member.name: M:SitemapAspNet.Attributes.SitemapAttribute.#ctor(System.String,SitemapAspNet.Attributes.SitemapAttribute.Frequence,System.Double)
member.param: Optional. Date of last modification file.
member.exception: Throw if isn't in W3C format.
Throw if has a value less than 0.0 or greater than 1.0.

member.name: M:SitemapAspNet.Attributes.SitemapAttribute._IsValidDate(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if the date is W3C format.
member.returns: True if the date is valid, False else.

member.name: M:SitemapAspNet.Attributes.SitemapAttribute._IsValidPriority(System.Double)
member.summary: Determines if the priority is between 0.0 and 1.0.
member.returns: True if the priority is valid, False else.

member.name: P:SitemapAspNet.Attributes.SitemapAttribute.Address
member.summary: Get or set a URL entry.
member.remarks: This property is required and is used to resolve the URL.

member.name: P:SitemapAspNet.Attributes.SitemapAttribute.ChangeFrequently
member.summary: Get a frequency of the page.
member.seealso: This property is optional and represents the rate of change of the page.

member.name: P:SitemapAspNet.Attributes.SitemapAttribute.LastModification
member.summary: Get a date of last modification file.
member.remarks: This property is optional and the date must be in the format W3C: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD.

member.name: P:SitemapAspNet.Attributes.SitemapAttribute.Priority
member.summary: Get a priority of URL entry.
member.remarks: The property is optional and must be represented by float number between 0.0 and 1.0.

member.name: F:SitemapAspNet.Attributes.SitemapAttribute.Frequence.Always
member.remarks: Use for pages that change every time they are accessed.

member.name: F:SitemapAspNet.Attributes.SitemapAttribute.Frequence.Never
member.remarks: Use this value for archived URLs.
